content.detailedDescription: While on patrol driving 78 west taking sycamore exit i see the 2 lights in the side of my vision, like headlights.  they were there for a long time, i could not ignore the light show, it was very obvious.  the 2 kind of moved around, then out of nowhere i saw one appear and split into 2 looking like the other.  i was driving trying to concentrate, this went on for a while.  the last i could see there was a single one left. i was alone in the car, but here were plenty of people on the roads around me and planes in the air.  palomar airport was nearby, i ended up last seeing it by vista jail.
content.summary: Yellow bright lights in sky split in two also disappear

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
i was driving on the 78 from twin oaks valley road, headed to vista. i first spotted it right off craven rd, though it was on the north side of the 78 and i was about a mile away and on the south side of the freeway. i was just leaving the craven area when i immediately noticed the object(s) in question:two extremely bright lights flying side by side, and the closer i got, i began to see very strange smoke (?) trails coming from each light. it (they?) was flying pretty low..300 to 500 feet would be my estimate. suddenly, two more very strange lights just appeared out of nowhere, flying almost parallel to the other two... again, these were incredibly bright and amber/orange. driving on the 78, i got some cell phone footage. soon, the second set of lights suddenly vanished. i kept following the remaining lights/smoke trail all the way to tri city hospital, where it turned north. creepy.. definitely not any normal plain fixed wing or helicopter. 

note about the cell phone footage: 

i did my best to film the objects, but please note i was having to drive around 70 mph to keep up. the objects appear as bright white lights in the videos, though they were an orange amber color (though very bright) to my eyes. the first object is spotted in the mid-upper left side of the frame. in the second video it is joined by it's mysterious partner, slightly to the left where it appeared out of nowhere.
content.summary: Two incredibly bright non-blinking orange/amber lights with strange trails following freeway. others appeared and vanished.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: It was july 25th 2014 and myself and my tour group were headed to abu simbel airport and were beginning our descent. i noticed a pyramidal mound in the distance out of the left side of the plane window. when i went to take the picture all of a sudden out of nowhere i saw a bright beam of white light and flash accelerate at great speed in the same direction we were flying in. the flash of light was only visible for about 4-5 seconds and was out of sight in a short period of time. i then went to look at the photo and zoomed in 100%. i noticed that the object look like an orb object that i've seen in other ufo photos i have viewed online and ufo hunters. i wouldn't have noticed the object if i hadn't first noticed the ancient mound structure in the background. being a person fascinated by ufo sightings and extraterrestrial beings my immediate reaction was a deep feeling and intuition that it was indeed a non-earthly space craft. i am rh negative, meaning my blood type is not inherent to this planet and have witnessed 2 other sightings in the past, both during night. this was my first encounter in the day time where i actually had a camera handy. after the picture of the mound was shot i tried to rush to flip my recording option on to get the object on film but by then it was out of sight. all i have is the photo to study but would like an expert's opinion as i am not 100% positive this was a ufo. the motions the object made were in a straight path as the same direction of our flight, what took me off guard was the sudden appearance of the object and the great speed it appeared to have. it also left some type of abnormal cloud in the distance although the normal clouds were a great distance beneath the plane and craft. everything happened so fast so i didn't get a chance to really observe the object long enough to know exactly what it was. i did feel a surge of excitement and shock, even a heart pounding reaction. i showed my friend who was sitting next to me on the plane the photo and another friend once i got home from vacation, both who said the object looks odd. my friend urged me to submit the photo.
content.summary: We were landing at abu simbel airport. i saw a pyramid mound in the distance and as i went to take a picture saw a flash of light in great speed accelerate in the direction we were flying in. i noticed an orb shape. i'm not 100% sure if it was a ufo.

content.detailedDescription: I was at my terrace and sitting idle around 12:o1am in night. i was gazing at sky and i saw it.I knew about the ufo's and its sightings so i analysed that it was an ufo.Object was circular  in shape ,there were lights on its sides and it was moving exactly at straight path in a slow motion.I was glad as well as frightened to see it.And i didn't sleep that night.It was moving in slow motion and then it suddenly blew with a high speed.
content.summary: I was sitting at my terrace and i saw it.

content.detailedDescription: While traveling southbound on the 55 fwy at exactly 8:22 p.M. pt, i observed 2 amber glowing lights traveling ne to my position. i got off the freeway and exited katella ave and turned right to pull into a gas station to stop for a quick observation. the leading craft blinked out and as i prepared my camera on my phone to record the trailing amber light, it blinked out, shifted spectral/human visible light. i have observed ufo phenomenon since i was a child living in miami in the 1970's and i know what is and what is not earth-based nav-lights and/or flight paths. feel free to contact me for any q/a about my sightings and more. i have a "keen eye" for this and i always have my eyes to the sky.
content.summary: 2 amber orbs

content.detailedDescription:
It was about ten after eight in the evening on sunday july 27th. i was outside at work taking a smoke break. i usually look up and scan the sky to see if i see anything unusual. it was mostly cloudy that day with a small chance of rain. i spotted what looked like a short contrail. in front of it was what i first thought was a plane. then i noticed it didn't have wings and a tail. it was round. i got my phone out and took a picture of it. that was kind of hard to do cause the camera on my phone doesn't zoom very much and i really couldn't see it on the screen. it took about fifteen seconds to get a second picture of it before it went behind some clouds or it disappeared and i didn't see it anymore. i've always kept an open mind about ufos and never have seen one before. i'm kind of dumbfounded by this experience because it's something i've never seen before and i don't know what it is. it's a weird feeling.

i'm sending four pictures of the object. the first pic is when i first saw it. the second is the first pic cropped done on my phone for a closer view. the third pic is the object just before it goes behind the clouds. it's harder to see it in this pic. i don't know if it's because it's farther away or entering the hazy part of the clouds or it's disappearing. the fourth is the third pic cropped also for a closer view.
content.summary: I spotted a slow moving round white object going south to north when scanning the sky..

content.detailedDescription:
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

this i saw that lasting for several days.
its around year 1994-97, i saw on heaven a rectangular shape light transparent w/ under cloud have size of 100 miles width and height of night, several days before it gone.

this i first ufo that clearly ,clarity and huge. i'm to puzzled many time that what things i saw on heaven, this not like spot light on airport at night because its fix or stationary on location. this last for several days at night 5-8pm soon. i remembered at i saw this ufo, their commercial airplane at noon that flying at low altitude at annex 40, betterliving parañaque city, philippines, almost all roof of house are vibrating.
content.summary: Rectangular transparent shape

content.detailedDescription: When driving on 151 from madison to platteville wi when a triangular ufo was witnessed.  i was alone in the car.  it was foggy that night.  heavy overcast.  visibility limited to 1/2 mile in the valleys.  when about 5 miles outside of dodgeville wi lights were observed about 1 oclock in front of the car.  the craft was large.  it was very eerie also.  there were three lights on the undercarriage of it.  no light was seen in the center of the craft.  the craft was jet black.  it was a 100 feet or more in subtended length.  a point of the triangle faced the car as it approached the craft hovering about 50 feet above the ground, 150 feet off the side of the road.  the craft then rotated and started to follow the car on the side of the highway.  the craft stayed with the vehicle for about 10 seconds until a hill got in between the craft and the car.  of course i started to freak out when this started occurring.  i guess it's notable that this wasn't the first time i've seen a triangular craft, and not the first time witnessing one when driving on the highway.  i guess it's also notable that all the sightings so far have been equally scary. i started kind of crying, partially in anger, partially in fear, as it started to follow me.  it was really scary.  the hair definitely stood up on the back of my neck, and felt a really hollow fear, i guess trepidation mixed with anger is the best explanation.  when the car passed the other side of the hill about 30 seconds later i had speed up to 100/110 mph, and the craft was not there.  i checked the time, and of course no time was lost.  nothing special about the sighting, but i guess i thought it was worth reporting.
content.summary: Sighting on highway during a foggy night

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on the i-5 freeway and noticed two golden circular lights in the southern facing sky. one of the lights split into two causing there to be three lights now and less than 30secs the two lights faded away completely leaving one light. this light lasted for another five minutes (while i followed it on the freeway) and then it also disappeared. it did not fly away it faded out like a light switch turning out.
content.summary: Light was very bright gold it split into 2 and then came back while one stayed the whole time.

content.detailedDescription: So, for the second time in two days i seen an object except this object looked different then the first one i saw the day before. this one that i just witnessed literally 20 minutes ago (currently 12:50) look at first glance like a airplane but then i realized that airplanes don't have a light around the whole plane, plus airplanes don't have weird pulsating 360 revolving lights. they also don't obviously disappear within seconds. you may wonder if it was just the cloud but oh no, there was no clouds around it.
content.summary: Disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside apt @ 1940 hrs; looked  southeastward and saw a large "fireball" with "tail" bright orange like . multiple a/c in the area? yes but very quiet.
content.summary: Large fireball falling abot 4 sec. till

content.detailedDescription: What are these they are out again tonight.  last night i just saw one and tonight i spotted three.  colored pulsing lights stationary in the sky.  tonight i had it witnessed by a friend 20 miles away.  another friend 5 miles down the way said she went to look after i told her.  she had a telescope.  she saw them too.  it is now 11:20 pm and they are still out there.  are they drones???  gas from stars???? surely planes that have flown in the area saw them.
content.summary: Looked at a star in the sky and wasn't dark yet went in the house to get binoculars   and saw the same thing as last night.

content.detailedDescription:
Normal night of star gazing until this object flew over me. appeared to be oval, brown/copper, no light reflection and velocity was incredible. object had zero sound and continued traveling southwest.

my thoughts at first we're an unidentified flying object and easily ruled out any logical known explanations.

sighting lasted 2-3 seconds and not the first time i have seen such a color of an unidentified object.

the startling part aside from other sightings i have witnessed, was the low altitude. it gave me some concern for my safety and decided to call it a night.
content.summary: Low fast traveling object with zero sound above witness

content.detailedDescription: 8/24 and 8/25 went outside just to breath and saw a ship coming in my direction and head out to space a minute passed as i watched another ship come from the same direction and head out the same way the rest then followed heading in the same direction one ship at a time 9 total. i watched each ship head into space. two nights in a row i have witnessed the same event.
content.summary: 9 ships living  and returned to space

content.detailedDescription:
My wife saw a craft on sunday, 17 august, 2014, 5:45 am. (nurse, on way to work.)
 
i just wish a picture had been taken. but the situation being what it was ï¿½ driving, early morning and deserted road except for one other vehicle ï¿½ that didnï¿½t happen.
 
she was driving north on south range line and had the ufo in sight from just south of shoal creek bridge to the river road and s range line at the compressor station.
 
the ufo appeared about a mile (or less) to the west of range line and except for the trees around shoal creek and thurman branch was in view for a couple of minutes and appeared to be about a mile 
to the west. altitude? four, five hundred feet ï¿½ pretty much speculation here. (she says 60 degrees above horizon)
 
when my wife stopped at  the saginaw post office and called me she was ï¿½wound upï¿½ and had definitely had an experience that was a bit unsettling.
content.summary: On way to work going north on s rangeline drive across shoal creek. kept object in view from cedar drive to river road.

content.detailedDescription: Durring high school i would travel about 25 mins to and from my girlfriends house every evening. on week nights i was required to be home no later than 22:00. therefore i would leave no later than 21:10 to ensure i was home in timely manner. one evening (around august i believe) i was traveling south bound on rt 62 graham station rd. around "brinker holow" when all of a sudden i was forced to come to a screeching halt due to a blinding white light filled my windshield. i wasn't able to see anything other than the light. i remember having to close my eyes due to the brightness. next thing i remember im about two miles from where the sighting and my phone is ringing. i answered it and it was my father. he was yelling at me wanting to know where i had been. i was very confused because i was on time, or so i thought i looked at the clock as i started to argue with him and the time was in fact about 23:15. at that point i was convinced my self that i in fact left late without realizing it. once i too the lashing from my father over the phone i saw that i had message after message from my girl friend and at this point she was accusing me of cheating. i waited until i got home and swore that my phone had in fact died and i couldn't find the charger and had just got it charged. i was so confused although never thought of it as a ufo sighting. honestly the sighting wasn't even very prevalent in my mind until a few weeks down the road. i then started day dreaming of the event and more and more came to me. now today im having dreams that i contribute to that night on rt 62. what i saw that night had to be from elsewhere.
content.summary: Left girl friends house traveling home saw blinding light lost around 1 hour of time

content.detailedDescription: I was standing out with my puppy in my backyard and gazing up at the beautiful stars out tonight and i noticed an object that was moving across the sky. it had no sound, it just flew over and away out of my sight. it was white and the same size as a star. i often see objects, but usually they blink. i am always seeing objects flying at night over the farm land around my property that have no noise and seem unusual. this one tonight was the first star like object and no blinking. that's why i decided i better report this one.
content.summary: Moving star like object

content.detailedDescription: I was outside coming from a walk in the woods. just walked into an open field clearing and saw from the corner of my eye what i thought was a shooting star (falling star). i stopped and watched the white glowing sphere travel above the tree line until it disappeared over a tall pine grove. traveling from south to north west.
content.summary: White lighted sphere traveling over tree tops

content.detailedDescription: Saturday night august 2nd, 2014 my brother and i were out hog hunting in glen rose, texas at the ranch of his wifes uncles.  my brother had forgotten the flashlights that we were going to use to hunt some hogs, well he went back home to retrieve said flashlights and i went to go check our game camera that we have in the north east corner field of the property. while walking to the camera nothing happened, but when i returned to my original position in the central most field of the ranch, that's when i saw a small light in the distance that was slowly approaching my position.  it didn't really seem to get any bigger, and was doing slow horizontal circles and just floated on by.
content.summary: Spherical orb floating through the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Getting groceries to go inside and noticed a bat, kept looking up at the sky to see the bat again... and then noticed a quiet helicopter shaped flying object with green and 2 blue lights on the bottom. heard a swoosh sound similar to a jet and it was gone. similar to the movement of a shooting star. it was too bright out to see the stars.
i felt confused and stunned.
it disappeared before my eyes.
content.summary: Looked like a helicopter and then disappeared in the blink of eye.

content.detailedDescription: It was arround 12:30 am ... i reached home after a short travelling .... my mom was busy in opening the locks of the house  ....Suddenly i saw in the sky ...A hexagonal shapeor you can say diamond shape object with white light  ...I can see it clearly . .... even i was able to see it's landing legs .....Ut was a very silent object .....As i shouted to call people from home and also my parents . ...That object gained a very gigh speed and get disappeared ....Unfortunately  i was not able to click it because it was a 5 to 10 min game  ...
content.summary: At night ut was a hexonal shape silent object with white light

content.detailedDescription: My 12 year old son, his friend, and i were traveling south on rangeline rd. it was raining. we were just outside of saginaw near mccutcheon dr. we had been shopping at the mall and were taking my sons friend home before going home. suddenly a loud noise was heard within the car, causing the speakers to also emit a strange noise that we had never experienced before. there was also a loud thump. all three of us were immediately disoriented. the display on the car, including the clock, the radio, and dashlights all turned off. then turned back on. everything had set back to the factory presets. there were no other cars around. i checked because at first i thought we had been hit by another car. we dropped his friend off and when we glanced up and to the right, there was a huge owl sitting, unmoving, in the middle of the day, on a powerline. it looked stoic and fake. very out of place. my son and i both felt weird, had headaches, and went home and went to bed early. the next day my husband had to reset all the radio stations in the car. the clock too. our car was brand new in 2012. we had never had this happen before, and it has not happened since.
content.summary: Strange incident in area of reported ufo sighting and landing.

content.detailedDescription: On august 9th at (around) 4pm, my mother, my daughter and myself were traveling on 77 north (about 30 miles south of wytheville, virginia), returning from a visit with my sister in wilmington, north carolina. traffic was moving very slow and was continuously and frequently "jamming" up to a slow crawl. i was the passenger, my mother was driving & my 10 year old daughter was in the back seat. i took the opportunity to photograph views of the countryside, being that we are from michigan & rarely get to see this part of the country. i seen a building that looked interesting to me, so i randomly photographed it. i continued to take photographs with my iphone 4 until we decided to pull over in wytheville, virginia for the evening. after we were settled in for the evening, i decided to flip through some of my photos i had taken. when i came across this one, i must say i was pretty surprised. i did not see this object in the sky when i originally took the picture of the building (lower right corner). i thought maybe it was the rearview mirror of our rental car (a 2014 toyota corolla) so i took several pictures (inside and out) of the rearview mirror. i could not duplicate it. there was no sun out, it was raining and foggy, so i discounted any type of sun reflection. please let me know what you think of this picture. thank you.
content.summary: Never seen a ufo with my own eyes, but seemingly one appeared in a random photograph i took with my cell phone.

content.detailedDescription: Craft was not seen but it's vapor trail was, have photos'.
content.summary: Craft was not seen but it's vapor trail was, have photos'

content.detailedDescription: My husband went out to walk the dog before bed. saw bright red light flying  over neighborhood moving down the street  (north of him). then, a military fighter jet flew overhead in a south  by southeast direction very close to ground. then the red light was gone. red light did not make any sound.  he will not report this because he believes this was a military  practice event, and that the light was some kind of silent drone. ha! i did not see the red light, but it did see the military jet fly over our house.
content.summary: See below

content.detailedDescription: Was in oelwein, iowa to visit friends and family staying at super 8 motel on 8-16-14. went outside about 8:30 give or take a little to look at the lights on the radio station towers that we always liked to see as kids. it was not all the way dark but getting there and there were some clouds. saw a bright red light the looked elongated vertically moving from south to north. when it got overhead the light was no longer visible but the object was below the clouds. it was a black disc moving about 40mph. when it was just getting out of sight another one exactly the same appeared right behind the first one and took the same path. i would guess the altitude to be about 2,000 feet for both. it was calm with no wind and not much light pollution in northeast iowa. i am a pilot of 40 years and am used to seeing other aircraft in flight but i have never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Bright red light  followed by another 20 seconds later. light not visable when overhead but black disc was.

content.detailedDescription: me and my neighbor was walking home from school and saw a disk with a top and bottem half it was about 3:00 pm and about 400 feet away and about 20 feet above the trees. plan as day it was there. we both seen it for about 20 seconds.It happen in maryville illinois walking home from school just yards before my house. it was right there in plan sight easy to see.I knew it was a ufo and so did my neighbor friend also new what it was a ufo.It was a disk shape about 30 feet in lenth and about 15 feet in high and was shiny silver with two sections a botten and a top. the top half was smaller then the bottem.The top half started about 3/4 up from the bottem of the craft. we thought that it was cool that we saw a ufo.When i came home i did ask my mom about it she said she saw it when she was looking out the window but was not sure what it was. mom said she thought it might of been a ufo. also one of the neighbors ask my mom about the next day. the ufo was setting stell and in a flash it left all you could tell is the direction it went.
content.summary: Disk 30' length 15' high two section

content.detailedDescription:
i had gotten out of bed and gone out on a porch to relieve myself as i often did. i don't remember the date but i'm sure in was 96 or 97.
   i was facing south and movement in the sky caught my eye.   it was clear that night.  at first glance i thought it might be a flock of geese but immediately realized it was a row of equally spaced lights. lights were a little larger but not much brighter than a star. i can't remember how many lights i saw at first but as i watched more appeared as the lights moved slowly se. as i remember there were 7 or 8 in the line. i was dumbfounded by it's size.  it stretched for more than 1/2 of the western sky.  then as i stood there lights appeared from  the porch roof overhead.  these lights were 90 degrees to the original lights and again covered better than 50 percent of the sky.   they moved slowly in sync with the original lights.  i assumed they were all part of the same unit but i could see or hear nothing but the lights.
    i watched for 20 minutes to half an hour as the lights moved slowly to the se.  they never flickered, changed direction or changed brightness or color nor did they change speed.
    i don't remember if i thought of taking photos or not.  i didn't have a digital camera at the time and usually had slow slide film  in the camera.
i wanted to go in and call a fellow teacher (physics)but i was so fascinated i wanted to keep watching.
    i watched as it eventually went out of sight to the south east of town
i did not go back to sleep that night. 
    i don't remember if i could see stars inside the l shape or not but i couldn't see any object.  just the lights. 
'   to clarify it was as if a massive carpenters square was moving to the south east with the open side leading.  the point in the back.
    i was very conscious of being awake and it not being a dream.     
    i went back into the house turned on my police scanner but heard no other report.
    i could make a drawing of the lights.
content.summary: I saw a row of lights running from nw to se.  after a bit a row of lights 90 degrees to the first passed over my house.

content.detailedDescription:
(just to note, this is my 3rd ufo sighting - all being slow-moving & orb-like.  i was never alone when i had these sightings, & i've never reported them)

after watching a movie, i went outside to smoke a cigarette.  i looked at the stars and noticed that one was flickering rather unusually.  i kept my eye on it, and realized that it would slowly move in sporadic directions.  i told my mom to come outside and look at it, mainly to see if she could notice it's slight movement as well.  she thought it was really odd, and went back inside after a few minutes.  me being fascinated with ufo's, i decided i would sit outside for a little while.  about 30 minutes later, i spotted another one further in the distance, and a few minutes later another one (they were most likely blocked off by the tree line, so i couldn't see it before).  i just sat outside in amazement, and didn't really want to miss such a rare opportunity.  after about an hour, i went inside.  about every thirty minutes or so, i would come back outside to check on it.  sure enough, it was still there until the last time i checked - somewhere around 2 in the morning.  by then, it was extremely cloudy.  i could only make out a few stars.  they were either gone, or just hidden by the massive amounts of clouds.

i'm 100% sure they weren't stars, i could visually see them moving slightly.  i noted their position relative to the stars, and the distance they moved in total didn't match up to the stars, which had barely moved over a course of a few hours.  between the first and last sighting, i would have to say the main ufo moved about 45 degrees across the sky - this being a rough estimation.  i wanted to take pictures of it on my iphone, but it was pitch black and couldn't be spotted through the camera lens.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 slow-moving white orbs

content.detailedDescription: Early this morning, i was laying on my back, on top of the car hood, head laying on the windshield. my mom was inside the closed in porch sitting at the table. she had gone inside just a few mins prior to the sighting. i had just muttered the words "i'm ready for a demonstration". at that exact moment, as incredible as it was, i noticed what appeared to be, for a split second 2 orange fireballs right next to each other, touching. i sat up and turned so as not to lose sight, at that moment i called out to my mom to hurry and get outside. even though i hadn't lost sight from my quick movement i had to regain a good focus, at that second it appeared that the objects had merged into a single orange fireball. i had my cell phone, a galaxy s5, sitting on my stomach when i was laying on the car so it was in hand as i got up from the car. i tried to get into the camera while keeping my eyes on the fireball. i glanced at the cell to start the video, and zoom to max. i did get about 15 seconds of video of the object and i could of kept the camera on the object however the binoculars were right by me and as the object got further away i wanted to see it up closer before it was completely out of sight. this was my first sighting and i have no doubt in my mind, it is a ufo. i have seen much smaller green fireballs multiple times here during the past week but those move so incredibly fast its impossible to capture on video unless you run a constent feed. i hadn't even heard of a green fireball until i seen it and then looked it up online and sure enough it is another phenomena, and i believe associated closely with ufo's. this orange fireball came from the south, moved silently, and faded out going west. i have video for you to see and i would like analyzed, especially the sound portion. after playing it over my tv, turning it way up you can hear what sounds like sonar to me. however i dont want to give up my rights to it which is why im not submitting here. i have attached zoomed in stills of the video you are welcome to use however you like.
content.summary: At 3:13 am while laying out on the car, looking up at the stars, i noticed an orange fireball
